text: Zacne grzechy is a 1963 Polish comedy film directed by Mieczysław Waśkowski. ==Cast== * Henryk Bąk as Ojciec Makary * Wiesław Gołas as Zbigniew Trzaska * Marian Jastrzebski * Bogumił Kobiela * Irena Kwiatkowska as Firlejowa * Franciszek Pieczka * Witold Pyrkosz as Onufry Geba * Alicja Sędzińska as Karczmarka Kasia * Andrzej Szczepkowski as Przeor Ignacy * Krystyna Kolodziejczyk as Witch Zosia ==References== ==External links== * Category:1963 films Category:1963 comedy films Category:Polish films Category:Polish comedy films Category:Polish black-and-white films Category:Polish-language films
title: Zacne grzechy
